Am 21.09.2012 um 03:50 schrieb Cédric Beust ♔:

> On Thu, Sep 20, 2012 at 11:48 AM, sebastian_4711 <usenet@...> wrote:
>
> > - @BeforeMethod is not executed, if a group is specified.
>
> This is intentional, either put that @BeforeMethod in the same group as the
> one you are running or specify "alwaysRun=true".
>
> --
> Cédric
> .
>
>


We found this as well. Let's put it that way. It is very flexible but I experienced it as not intuitive.

I expect a @BeforeMethod to run always otherwise I would call it @BeforeMethodIfGroupMatches
